history.proof: intros y x z H1 H2. qsimpl use: star_plus_plus.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : R x y H2 : star R y z The term "y" has type "X" while it is expected to have type "plus R ?y ?z".

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.

original: intros y x z H1 H2. apply (star_plus_plus _ y). apply H2. apply (plus1 y _). apply H1.
